body_html:
There is no libpthread in Android. Another easy way to compile your app is to add linkopts to your BUILD, something like

    linkopts = select({
        "//tensorflow:android": [],
        "//conditions:default":......
    }),
body:
There is no libpthread in Android. Another easy way to compile your app is to add `linkopts` to your `BUILD`, something like
```
    linkopts = select({
        "//tensorflow:android": [],
        "//conditions:default":......
    }),
```
